properties.comment: English language file for jdrconverter https://github.com/nlct/flowframtk GPL-3.0 Nicola Talbot
properties.entry: One input file and one output file must be specified. The switches {0} and {1} are optional but if {1} is omitted then the output file must come after the input file.
{0} (or {1}) <format> Input file format (optional if can be inferred from input file).
{0} (or {1}) <format> Output file format (optional if can be inferred from the file name, otherwise default to JDR).
{0} <lang-tag> Use localisation support for the given locale (if available).
{0} <version> If the output format is JDR or AJR, use this version (default: {1}).
{0} (or {1}) Crop or encapsulate output image (if applicable).
{0} <n> Set the default normalsize to <n> (may be overridden if input file is JDR/AJR).
{0} (or {1}) <prefix> Set the basename prefix for exported embedded bitmaps (if applicable).
{0} <path> Set the directory for exported embedded bitmaps (if applicable).
{0} Extract embedded bitmaps when importing (if applicable).

{0} <type> Export to a LaTeX file. The <type> may be one of: "pgf" just a pgfpicture environment. "doc" complete document that draws the image. "flow" complete document that uses the flowfram package (only objects with flow frame data will be exported).
{0} Use LaTeX (and friends) to create the output file (if supported). This option will be ignored if the output format always requires or never requires external processes.
{0} List all supported output formats and exit.
{0} List all supported input formats and exit.

{0} <value> Indicates what settings should be saved (only applicable if the output format is JDR or AJR). The <value> may be one of: "none" Don''t save any settings. "all" Save all settings. "paper" Only save the paper (AJR/JDR v1.3+). "match-input" Match the input file (provided it''s supported by the output format).
{0} <charset> Set the character encoding to <charset> for the input file (where applicable).
{0} <charset> Set the character encoding to <charset> for the output file (where applicable).
This image requires the following commands in the preamble:
The normal size font is assumed to be {0}pt
Unexpected value ''{0}'': only one input and one output file permitted. (Use {1} for help.)
Unable to import from file format ''{0}'' (export only).
Unable to export to file format ''{0}'' (import only).
No image found: nothing to save.
Option ''{0}'' not available for {1} version {2}. Falling back on ''{3}''
